channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: ðŸ”´ 22:51 Air Alarm to Lviv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 22:51 Air Alarm to Lviv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Lviv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
